subject: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor
description_text:
Hi,

I see that you have really good product, but, real professionals really hate, don't need that holes on pedals, so I suggest that you have pedals in your offer without holes.

Again, thank you for your hard work and respect for your product.

Thank you Bye.[image: 3-3_4d3bf9e4-a79e-4330-b211-c4106ecd5e39_without holes.jpg]

conversations.body_text: Hi Mladen Krkalo, Thank you for your feedback. We will discuss with our design team whether to release a version of the panel without holes.

Great, thank you, that is very smart and good decision from you.

I know that holes looks cool, but believe me, professionals, real drivers hate holes.

Again thank you, you have a great product, so, keep up the good work.

Bye.

Thu, Jun 5, 2025, 09:32 service@simsonn.com
